channel.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
channel.description:
Yea here are 2 of my models, i am have a ton of trouble making them 3d
i know they totally suck but this is my 2nd day of modeling and im not expecting anybody to be amazed from the models
and i know what you are going to say (you traced it or something)
please dont say that, just say things that can help me further in modeling
im not planning on quitting, right now im searching for a tut to change it to 3d
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk170/xcvxcv2/scimmynolines.jpg[/img]
umm yea that took awhile considering i have no clue how to make faces
if you don't believe me look for yourself
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk170/xcvxcv2/scimmylines.jpg[/img]
also i tried a grenade and i thought it would be easy
i just tried it because ive never seen one on here and i thought it could be the start of a new weapon or something
i epically failed
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk170/xcvxcv2/grenademeta.jpg[/img]

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:13, topic:280937”][quote author=xcvxcv2 link=topic=371016.msg2804482#msg2804482 date=1243643092]

there to good to be firsts

???

too good???

lol they look horrible to me

anyway i was wondering in datmaker if it says contains lines if that is bad (obviously its not good)

if so can somebody tell me how to delete all the lines?
[/quote]

The latest datmakers are made so they ignore the lines, the model will still be the exactly the same, don’t worry about it at all.

And at the guy who said they’re too good, wth are you on about, he drew out a 2d image using a line tool and a traced image, how would that be too good. No offence. :/[/quote]

non taken thats why i asked y they are too good

also thanks for the info about the lines

i think i followed you tutorial of how to do that lol

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:

there to good to be firsts
[/quote]

???

too good???

lol they look horrible to me

anyway i was wondering in datmaker if it says contains lines if that is bad (obviously its not good)

if so can somebody tell me how to delete all the lines?[/quote]

The latest datmakers are made so they ignore the lines, the model will still be the exactly the same, don’t worry about it at all.

And at the guy who said they’re too good, wth are you on about, he drew out a 2d image using a line tool and a traced image, how would that be too good. No offence.

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:9, topic:280937”]He selects more dots ( No not dots… POINTS )
using the SHIFT key (hold it and click multipile dots)
Don’t forget to select the ‘Move’ tool first! ;)[/quote]

lol ok thanks, i was trying the ctrl key and it wasnt working

lol sorry i meant points but i couldn’t think of the word

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

He selects more dots ( No not dots… POINTS )
using the SHIFT key (hold it and click multipile dots)
Don’t forget to select the ‘Move’ tool first!

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

oh ok thanks guys

yea i saw CJ’s youtube video, im still confused on how i make the faces i know they are wrong

in the video i think he moves the dots up, i dont know how he selected more then 1 dot

some one please explain

also im googleing a tut on how to make it 3d so its ok if you dont post.

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

dylan_0789:

I made a grenade in 3d class. But I actually made one, I didn’t trace/draw it. Tbh, they’re not models. They’re 2d images on a 3d program.

also you scim all the faces have to be fix they cant cross over like that or will not work in game, as for the nad you should of made the key and the nad as 2 differant models and put them together, not as the same one.

Read full topic

item.title: Umm first model (NOT DONE)
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

xcvxcv2:

Yea here are 2 of my models, i am have a ton of trouble making them 3d

well one problem is the faces you are gonna have to redo them if you are trying to make them 3d. and a example on how to make them 3d… well on the blade you need 2 lines of points on each side of the model then you connect the lines on the outline, what u have right now, and make faces connecting the outline to the lines on both sides of the outline. catch my drift… im to tired to explain it more… but good job on the 2d models =]

Read full topic
